title: What it's like to play Teamfight Tactics for the first time

replies.body: this would be better with sound.

> [{quoted}](name=BLACK REALM GOD,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=oeAGFPt3,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2019-06-23T23:31:50.672+0000)
>
> this would be better with sound.

Oh i'm sorry. I have an encyclopedic knowledge of that show and for some reason thought everyone else was weird like me.

Sadly, I couldn't find a clip of that somewhere.

> [{quoted}](name=Periscope,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=oeAGFPt3,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2019-06-23T23:44:46.488+0000)
>
> Oh i'm sorry. I have an encyclopedic knowledge of that show and for some reason thought everyone else was weird like me.
> 
> Sadly, I couldn't find a clip of that somewhere.

YoU kNoW wHaT yOu HaVe To Do
what is it like to be privileged enough to be let to log in to pbe ? lol some of us can wait days in queue to log in and never get in

> [{quoted}](name=Dracul,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=oeAGFPt3,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2019-06-24T07:34:39.363+0000)
>
> what is it like to be privileged enough to be let to log in to pbe ? lol some of us can wait days in queue to log in and never get in

Ya got me. I've not played it. I imagine the upper echelons of players that get to play this must be in the highest levels of society. When they deign to grace us with their presence, it is surely a spectacle to be cherished.
They'll travel through street with full-armed horse guards parade in pinky dress waving at unfortunate peasants.

MAKE WAY! FOR T-F-T!

SAY HEY! FOR T-F-T!

"I suggest a new strategy: let the Robot win."

https://i.giphy.com/media/iAlxBZN0M9w4g/giphy.gif

watched a ton of streams, learned all the classes and origins, used a cheatsheet for the items...
still was overwhelmed and got stomped lol.
